translations.about-paragraph1: I am a developer and enthusiast with more than eight years of experience in developing custom software solutions.
translations.about-paragraph2: Creating solutions to benefit everyday tasks and ease workflows has always been my strive.
translations.about-paragraph3: I created small CLI-based programs to automate different tasks. Most of which can be found on my GitHub.
translations.about-paragraph4: I am employed as a freelancer at the Deutsche Auslandsgesellschaft, where I developed multiple internal solutions and built out the networking and server infrastructure. Since June of 2022 I lead the technical preparations for the IDT 2025 – a one‑week‑long conference of german teachers from around the world.
translations.projects-paragraph: A list of my completed and ongoing projects.
translations.domains-paragraph: A list of the domains I own, including a brief explanation of what they are used for.
